mapper.select: select menu.permission_code as permission from sys_menu menu inner join sys_role_menu rm on rm.permission_id=menu.id inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id=rm.role_id where length(menu.permission_code)>0 and ur.user_id=#{userId}
select menu.permission_code as permission from sys_menu menu inner join sys_role_menu rm on rm.permission_id=menu.id where length(menu.permission_code)>0 and rm.role_id=#{roleId}
select menu.id from sys_menu menu inner join sys_role_menu rm on rm.permission_id=menu.id inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id=rm.role_id where ur.user_id=#{userId}
